CustomSql.Name: Demographic DataSet
CustomSql.SqlQuery: SELECT location.country, location.latitude, location.longitude, COUNT(*) * 100  / (SELECT COUNT (*) as total FROM "<resourcesPrefix>-athenaCatalog"."<resourcesPrefix>-database"."sentiments" AS t3 JOIN "<resourcesPrefix>-athenaCatalog"."<resourcesPrefix>-database"."users" AS t4 ON t3.userid = t4.id WHERE t1.location.country = t3.location.country AND t1.location.latitude = t3.location.latitude AND t1.location.longitude = t3.location.longitude ) as negativeAverage FROM "<resourcesPrefix>-athenaCatalog"."<resourcesPrefix>-database"."sentiments" AS t1 JOIN "<resourcesPrefix>-athenaCatalog"."<resourcesPrefix>-database"."users" AS t2 ON t1.userid = t2.id WHERE sentiment = 'NEGATIVE' GROUP BY location
